page.title: 07FARMING
page.content: All the fields in the block belong to one farm.The tenant farmer is Mr. R. Brigham.The owner is Col. H. Crossman.Mr. R. Brigham works on 251 acres.On the cultivated fields he has got spring barley and turnips. On the rough grazing fields he has 250 sheep, 320 lambs, 20 cows, 20 calfs, and 1 bull.He has some farm machinery.He has 2 tractors,a rotorvater,a set of discs,a elevator, a corn drill and a sprayer.The farm house is derelict and not suitable for habitation so Mr. Brigham and his family live in the village. Some of the farm buildings are being renovated.
